source_sentence: 已善說此淨因道　　謂佛至言真法性
應捨闇盲諸外執　　惡見所為求慧眼
translation: He should give up the darkness and blindness of ignorance for the sake of wisdom, having abandoned false views.

source_sentence: 此涅槃宮一廣道　　千聖所遊無我性
諸佛日言光所照　　雖開殊眼不能覩
於此方隅已略說　　為開智者慧毒門
庶各隨己力堪能　　遍悟所知成勝業
translation: Each one, according to his ability, accomplishes the supreme work of perfect enlightenment by means of his knowledge.

source_sentence: 說一切有部俱舍論卷第三十
translation: Saṃyuktâgama-śāstra, vol. 30
